text: Kalle Koljonen (born 26 February 1994) is a Finnish badminton player. In 2014, he won a bronze medal at the European Men's Team Championships in Basel. In 2015, he became the runner up of Slovenia International and won Hungarian International. In 2016, he became the runner-up of Bulgarian International. == Achievements == === BWF International Challenge/Series === Men's singles {| class="sortable wikitable" style="font-size: 90%;" ! Year !
